Redeemed amount will be wired directly to your provided bank account.

You can go to your Settings > Bank Info to update your bank account details. Our support staff may contact you should you have incorrectly entered your bank information.

SPECIFICATIONS

Redeemed amount will be directly wired to your provided bank account.

You must provide a valid email upon requesting cash back.

You must verify your email before reward can be processed.

Reward subject to approval and may take up to 21 days to process.

TERMS AND CONDITIONS:

You must provide a valid email address upon requesting for Cash.

Emails MUST be verified before your reward can be processed. If you have already verified your email, there is no need to do so twice UNLESS you change your bank information.
